reviewText: Great exercise video.  If you only have 15 minutes trust me you see results.

I went to a lot of trouble to make this DVD work by buying a multi region DVD player and I have to say it was worth it!  I really enjoy the workouts and appreciate the stretch section very much.  That is so important and yet so often missing from other workouts I've tried.  I really like Davina's personality and her trainers are really good at what they do.  The best part though is every section is only 15 minutes.  I love that and it is not that easy to find.
